Pre-Game Insights: India have a 1-0 lead in the series, but Sri Lanka have a chance to level the series with a win in the third ODI.
The Indian batting unit has performed way below par in the series, but their highly recognised batting lineup still have one more opportunity to make amends versus the Sri Lankan spin bowling attack.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitches at the R Premadasa Stadium in Colombo have provided a lot of assistance to the spin bowlers, making the job of the batters quite difficult in the middle overs.
The average first inning score of 226 in ODI cricket at this venue could end up being very difficult to chase down for either Sri Lanka or India in the series decider.
Others: Sri Lanka have a 1-0 lead in the series currently after registering a famous win in the second ODI with the help of their bowlers, following the tied first match.
